title: Where is Camille?
body: Is Camille out yet? I don't see her in stores =/

replies.body: At least 10 of these are made every time a new champ is about to be released, it has been the exact same way forever
Yea I didn't give a shit bout the past releases but this time, I do
She's on Avatar Island yelling at Tenzin for letting the Korra run about doing whatever Korra does.

Reference to Avatar The Legend of Korra.

Since Camille looks like Beifong.

Generally Champions are released later in the patch not immediately on patch release.

Quote straight from the patch notes.

"Patch 6.24 notes
By Scarizard, Aether, Gentleman Gustaf & Luqizilla

Champions
Camille

    Camille, the Steel Shadow, will be released later on during patch 6.24! In the meantime, learn more about Leagueâ€™s newest champion here"
Should be coming in a day or 2
